description:
Yield index classes

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
61521 Purchase values of agricultural land

Definition:
The yield index indicates the soil's natural productivity
based on natural production conditions, such as, in
particular, the soil characteristics, surface landscape and
climatic conditions. It is calculated from the results of
the official land appraisal and is one of the bases for
determining assessed values and hence for the taxation of
agricultural and forestry property. For reasons of
simplification and because of unclear ownership structures,
the fiscal authorities in the new Länder to some extent
determine the assessed values using average municipal yield
indices.
